base_description: Analyzing the topology, we find 8 nodes and 10 branches in this circuit. For passive elements, the circuit contains 4 resistor(s). For power supply, the circuit has 5 voltage source(s), 1 current source(s). There are no controlled sources in this circuit. No measurements are configured. In total, this circuit comprises 10 circuit elements.

edits.instruction: Update DC voltage source 3: change its value from 2V to 1V.
Update voltage supply 5: change its value from 81mV to 243kV.
